testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to be able to delete holiday information for the specified id number via API connection.
testcase.name: The Deleted Id information in the response body returned from the /api/holidayDelete endpoint should be
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/holidayDelete" path parameters.....................passed * The api user prepares a DELETE request containing the holiday ids to be deleted to send to the api holidayDelete endpoint..passed * The api user sends the DELETE request and saves the response returned from the api holidayDelete endpoint..passed * The api user verifies that the Deleted id information in the response body is the same as the id information in the request body..passed
